snippet: The State House on Thursday approved $48.7 million for the Detroit Public Schools to keep the district from shutting down next month.
abstract: Michigan State House approves $48.7 million to keep Detroit Public Schools district from shutting down in April.
lead_paragraph: The State House on Thursday approved $48.7 million for the Detroit Public Schools to keep the district from shutting down next month.

headline.main: Michigan: Aid for Detroit Schools Advances
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Aid for Detroit Schools Advances
